actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to establish criminal penalties for any U.S. citizen who marries an illegal alien for the sole purpose of establishing immediate relative status for that alien.

summary.text: Establishes criminal penalties of not more than $5,000 or imprisonment for not more than five years or both, for any United States citizen who marries an illegal alien for the sole purpose of establishing immediate relative status for that alien.

titles.title: A bill to establish criminal penalties for any U.S. citizen who marries an illegal alien for the sole purpose of establishing immediate relative status for that alien.
